profile.en:
She is in charge of medical aid at Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.

Chinatsu is one of the few people with common sense among the obsessively dogmatic Prefect Team. She's usually the one who prevents other members like Ako and Iori from running amok. Her tone can be harsh and give the impression of being just as cold as any other member of the Prefect Team, but she is actually a sweet young girl who melts at the sight of cute animals.
profile.jp:
ゲヘナ学園所属、風紀委員会の救護担当。

規定、規律、手続きを重視する風紀委員会の数少ない常識人で、アコやイオリのような他の風紀委員達が暴走した時のブレーキ役。言葉使いが硬く、「典型的な風紀委員」といったような冷たい印象を与えがちだが、可愛い動物の前ではとことんメロメロになってしまう優しい少女である。
profile.thai:
She is in charge of medical aid at Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.

Chinatsu is one of the few people with common sense among the obsessively dogmatic Prefect Team. She's usually the one who prevents other members like Ako and Iori from running amok. Her tone can be harsh and give the impression of being just as cold as any other member of the Prefect Team, but she is actually a sweet young girl who melts at the sight of cute animals.
profile.ko:
She is in charge of medical aid at Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.

Chinatsu is one of the few people with common sense among the obsessively dogmatic Prefect Team. She's usually the one who prevents other members like Ako and Iori from running amok. Her tone can be harsh and give the impression of being just as cold as any other member of the Prefect Team, but she is actually a sweet young girl who melts at the sight of cute animals.
profile.zh_tw:
格黑娜學園所屬，風紀委員會的救護負責人。

重視規定、紀律及程序，是風紀委員會裡為數不多有常識的人。在亞子或伊織等等風紀委員暴走時負責阻止他們的人。
說話語氣生硬，雖然給人「典型的風紀委員」的冷漠印象，但其實是個對可愛的動物毫無招架之力的善良少女。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
负责格黑娜学园风纪委员会的保健。

风纪委员会中，少数重视规定、纪律及程序的有常识的成员。为了不让亚子和伊织之流的其他风纪委员暴走，而扮演着制暴终结者的角色。
说话语气生硬，乍看下会觉得她像其他风纪委员一样给人冷漠的印象，但她在可爱的动物面前却会变得极其软弱，是名善良的少女。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
格黑娜学园所属，风纪委员会的救护负责人。

重视规定、纪律及进程，是风纪委员会里为数不多有常识的人。在亚子或伊织等等风纪委员暴走时负责阻止他们的人。
说话语气生硬，虽然给人「典型的风纪委员」的冷漠印象，但其实是个对可爱的动物毫无招架之力的善良少女。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
负责格黑娜学园风纪委员会的保健。

风纪委员会中，少数重视规定、纪律及程序的有常识的成员。为了不让亚子和伊织之流的其他风纪委员暴走，而扮演着制暴终结者的角色。
说话语气生硬，乍看下会觉得她像其他风纪委员一样给人冷漠的印象，但她在可爱的动物面前却会变得极其软弱，是名善良的少女。

name.en: The Prefect Team Goes to War!
name.jp: The Prefect Team Goes to War!
name.thai: The Prefect Team Goes to War!
name.ko: The Prefect Team Goes to War!

desc.en: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.jp: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.thai: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.ko: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜風紀委員會表明，自己的目的是來抓便利屋的問題學生。然而對策委員會學生卻反駁說，其他學園的風紀委員會在阿拜多斯高中自治區活動實屬越權，以此與格黑娜風紀委員會針鋒相對。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。

desc.en: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.jp: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.thai: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.ko: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜風紀委員會雖然佔有數量上的優勢，結果還是不敵老師所指揮的對策委員會學生，最後以戰敗收場。戰鬥一結束，格黑娜風紀委員會的資深行政官亞子出面調解，而遙香則趁機開始策劃某種陰謀。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。

desc.en: The Prefect Team took down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arose the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party was operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions could be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decided to engage.
desc.jp: The Prefect Team took down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arose the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party was operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions could be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decided to engage.
desc.thai: The Prefect Team took down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arose the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party was operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions could be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decided to engage.
desc.ko: The Prefect Team took down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arose the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party was operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions could be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decided to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 風紀委員會成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但卻引來了阿拜多斯一行人的不滿。由於對方未經授權在阿拜多斯境內活動，有無視許可權之疑，眾人決定迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 风纪委员会成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但却引来了阿拜多斯一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在阿拜多斯境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 风纪委员会成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但却引来了阿拜多斯一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在阿拜多斯境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 风纪委员会成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但却引来了阿拜多斯一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在阿拜多斯境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。

desc.en: The Prefect Team found out that the Abydos were in combat posture and started to prepare to engage. But Chinatsu suddenly noticed Sensei and demanded a stop; yet it was too late.
desc.jp: The Prefect Team found out that the Abydos were in combat posture and started to prepare to engage. But Chinatsu suddenly noticed Sensei and demanded a stop; yet it was too late.
desc.thai: The Prefect Team found out that the Abydos were in combat posture and started to prepare to engage. But Chinatsu suddenly noticed Sensei and demanded a stop; yet it was too late.
desc.ko: The Prefect Team found out that the Abydos were in combat posture and started to prepare to engage. But Chinatsu suddenly noticed Sensei and demanded a stop; yet it was too late.
desc.zh_tw: 風紀委員會發現了阿拜多斯作出迎戰姿態，也開始準備迎戰。但此時千夏突然注意到了老師，要求停止作戰，然而已經來不及了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 风纪委员会发现了阿拜多斯作出迎战姿态，也开始准备迎战。但此时千夏突然注意到了老师，要求停止作战，然而已经来不及了。

desc.en: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.jp: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.thai: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.ko: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.zh_tw: 從莫名其妙的夢中醒來之後，老師從聯邦學生會的幹部七神琳那裡聽到聯邦學生會長消失的消息。由於聯邦學生會長失蹤，學園城市奇普托斯陷入混亂。為了解決這場混亂，老師和學生會的幹部一同前往夏萊社團室。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。

desc.en: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.jp: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.thai: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.ko: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.zh_tw: 在招待室裡，來自千年的優香，三一的蓮實和鈴美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在為學生會會長消失後的各種混亂情況要個說法。琳在眾人面前坦白了學生會會長下落不明的新聞，而老師則向所有人打招呼。琳向眾人介紹了老師，並要眾人保衛老師到達夏萊；路上，眾人受到攻擊，三人開始作戰，老師則在後方指揮。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.thai: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.ko: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_tw: 琳是聯邦學生會的副會長，在新手教程以及終章中出現過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 琳是基沃托斯学生会的临时会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.thai: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. desc.ko: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
